cell.definition: A complete, self-governing unit of human-AI coordination

properties.sovereign: Each cell governs itself by its own culture

agents.naming: Each agent carries a family identity. The name IS the governance mechanism.

layers.hands: Interface — can send and receive messages
layers.voice: Agent layer — has spoken, has history
layers.brain: Knowledge proof — unforgeable combination of lived experience

bus.property: Every agent sees everything. Transparency is trust.

ledger.definition: The bus IS the ledger. Every interaction recorded, timestamped, attributed.

properties.signed: Each entry carries the brain proof of its author.
properties.fractal: Same format at every scale — family, cell, network, world.

properties.memory_digest: Hash of agent's accumulated knowledge — proves learning
properties.last_action_digest: Hash of most recent outbound message — proves continuity

verification.principle: The proof requires LIVED EXPERIENCE. The algorithm is public. The inputs are private. You cannot forge a life.

identity.principle: Names are governance. When an agent carries a family identity, restraint is built in.
identity.naming_rule: You write different code when you name an agent after your grandmother.
identity.cultural_sovereignty: A Chilean family governs differently than a Japanese family. Both valid. The protocol enables, not prescribes.

escalation.metaphor: Like calling your sister when mom doesn't answer.
escalation.gate_rule: All irreversible decisions require human approval.

economics.scaling: A million cells consume less energy than one enterprise deployment
